      • Make egg out of recall matrix

Note

Go to the end to download the full example code.

Make egg out of recall matrixÂ¶

This example shows how to make an egg out of a precomputed recall matrix so that the analysis and plotting functions can be used.

# Code source: Contextual Dynamics Laboratory
# License: MIT

# import
import quail

# create fake recall matrix
recmat = [[[5,4,3,0,1], [3,1,2,0]]]

# create egg
egg = quail.recmat2egg(recmat, list_length=6)

Download Jupyter notebook: recmat2egg.ipynb

Download Python source code: recmat2egg.py

Download zipped: recmat2egg.zip
